name: Color Match 3 - Senior Game
description:
Tellmewow is a mobile game development company specialized in easy adaptation and basic usability, which makes our games ideal for the elderly or young people who simply want to play an occasional game and train their cognitive skills.


CONTACT US

If you have any suggestions for improvement or want to keep informed about upcoming games that we are going to publish, follow us on our social networks.
